definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Ultrasonography is the main method for diagnosing fetal anomaly of multiparous pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 結論超聲檢查是產前診斷多胎異常的主要方法。
改善產前和圍產期護理。

sentences.english: Antenatal diagnosis is usually made after 22 weeks of gestation.
sentences.chinese: 通常在產前檢查時發現此腫瘤約爲懷孕22周以後。

sentences.english: Conclusion With the use of the method reported, the non invasive prenatal diagnosis of DMD is possible.
sentences.chinese: 結論初步建立了DMD的無創性產前基因診斷的方法。

sentences.english: Now we use a number of tests to target our efforts on those in high-risk groups.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們着力採用一些產前檢查來觀測高危產婦。

sentences.english: FISH is a new, effective method for prenatal diagnosis of Down's syndrome.
sentences.chinese: FISH是一種新型產前診斷失天愚型的有效方法。

sentences.english: Fetal DNA in maternal plasma could be regarded as the gene resource for noninvasive prenatal diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 孕婦血漿中游離胎兒DNA可以用於無創傷產前診斷。

sentences.english: Did not know that has mother to experience before being in labor, the fetal membrane bursts early.
sentences.chinese: 不知道有沒有媽媽經歷過在臨產前，胎膜早破裂。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of the non stress test(NST) in antepartum monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 目的正確評價無負荷試驗在產前監護中的應用價值。

sentences.english: Needless to depression, What, then still to be recommended to the hospital antenatal check search.
sentences.chinese: 不用擔心，但是還是建議到醫院做個產前檢查。

sentences.english: Objective To study the value of Two-dimensional ultrasound in examing fetal cleft lip and cleft palate before birth.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討二維超聲產前診斷胎兒脣裂的價值。

sentences.english: Compulsory pre-natal classes could be mooted - but he doubted they were realistic.
sentences.chinese: 強制產前班可以提出，但是他懷疑它們是現實可能性。

sentences.english: Conclusion MRI is valuable for prenatal diagnosis of placental invasion.
sentences.chinese: 結論產前MRI對於診斷胎盤植入具有重要價值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnostic value of ultrasound systemic screening in pre-natal fetal malformations .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲在產前診斷胎兒畸形的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ultrasonography is the main method for diagnosing fetal anomaly of multiparous pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 結論超聲檢查是產前診斷多胎異常的主要方法。

sentences.english: She may have had a prenatal paternity test done.
sentences.chinese: 也許她做過產前親子鑑定。

definition: to do a blood test/to have one's blood tested
abbr. for 產前檢查|产前检查[chan3 qian2 jian3 cha2]
(zoology, medicine) mother's body/(chemistry etc) parent/matrix/(statistics) population/parent population
(Tw) medical checkup/physical examination (abbr. for 健康檢查|健康检查[jian4 kang1 jian3 cha2])
